leader_adhesion.description: Strength of leader cells\' cell-cell adhesion

leader_repulsion.description: Strength of leader cells\' cell-cell repulsion

follower_adhesion.description: Strength of follower cells\' cell-cell adhesion

follower_repulsion.description: Strength of follower cells\' cell-cell repulsion

rho_L.description: Minimum ECM density required for cell motility

rho_H.description: Maximum ECM density allowing cell motility

default_chemotaxis_bias.description: Chemotaxis bias for ECM following type cells

default_ECM_sensitivity.description: Cell sensitivity to ECM orientation for ECM following type cells

default_hysteresis_bias.description: Cell's base sensivity to previous cell direction - cell motility history bias

oxygen_migration_bias_for_leaders.description: Chemotaxis bias for non-ECM influenced cell types

ECM_dx.description: Length of ECM unit in x-direction

ECM_dy.description: Length of ECM unit in y-direction

ECM_dz.description: Length of ECM unit in z-direction

Model_Selection_Parameters.description: Allows selection of various cell motility-ECM models

cell_motility_ECM_interaction_model_sele.description: Specifies the cell-ECM interaction model: follower chemotaxis/no follower hysteresis, follower hysteresis/no follower chemotaxis

discrete_ECM_remodeling.description: Specifies discrete versus continous ECM remodeling: 1 = continous; 0 = discrete

link_anisotropy_and_bias.description: Selects if chemotaxtic bias on followers is coupled exactly to ECM anisotropy or not: 1 = not coupled; 0 = coupled

ecm_update_model.decription: Specifies ECM reorientation model: ecm_update_from_cell_motility_vector or ecm_update_from_cell_velocity_vector

unit_test_setup.description: Specifies cell, ECM, and domain parameters for consistent unit tests of ECM influenced mechanics and mechanics influence on ECM: 1 for testing set up, 0 for regular set up

march_unit_test_setup.description: Specifies that cells will reset their position to the left boundary and that density is 0.5 for the behavior to ECM march test 1 for march set up, 0 for regular set up

visual_guideline_pattern.description: Specifies pattern of line overlay: none, horizontal lines, vertical lines, or concentric circles

cell_setup.description: Specifies the initial cell setup: single, random, lesion, cells at y = 0, circle of cells, or cells at left boundary/march

ECM_orientation_setup.description: Specifies the initial ECM orietation: random, horizontal, vertical, circular, starburst, or split

chemical_field_setup.description: Specifies the chemotatic field gradient orientation: starburst, vertical up, horizontal right, angle, or none

angle_of_chemical_field_gradient.description: Angle of chemical field gradient orientation, specified in degrees
